Key Match Events: Atlanta Braves pitcher Charlie Morton gave up a three-run homer to Michael Massey in the first inning
Post-Match Reflections: The Atlanta Braves will play a doubleheader against the New York Mets on Monday to determine whether they will make the playoffs
Miscellaneous Highlights: Atlanta and the Mets are both 88-72, and Arizona finished 89-73
Others: Charlie Morton threw in the first inning of a baseball game against the Kansas City Royals
